data.Title: Google Search Experiencing Indexing Issues
data.Description: Reports of a Google Search indexing issue are surfacing, affecting major sites like WSJ, NYT, CNN, and Forbes, with new content not being indexed or served.

data.Title: Google Spam Update June 2024
data.Description: Heads-up. The June 2024 Spam Update is rolling out. Could take up to a week to roll out. Very interesting. :)

data.Title: Google Search Algorithm Leak
data.Description: While Google has provided some insights on how its algorithm works in ranking web pages, most strategies we know are still based on studies and trials of marketers and SEO experts.

data.Title: Sudden Spikes in Googlebot Crawling Activity Could Be a Bad Sign
data.Description: An article from Search Engine Journal reporting that sudden spikes in Googlebot crawling activity on a website could be a sign of hacking or other issues, according to Google's Gary Illyes.

data.Title: Google AI Overviews Analysis
data.Description: New analyses reveal that Google's AI Overviews are appearing less frequently, now showing up for an average of 7-9% of queries. Additionally, Reddit is no longer among the top 10 most cited domains within these overviews.

data.Title: Google Tests Showing Fewer Reddit and Quora Links
data.Description: Some in the SEO industry have been asking if Google has been showing fewer links in its search results to Reddit over the past several weeks. So Mordy Obserstein pulled some Semrush data that showed a slight downtick in Reddit results in Google's Discussion and Forums section.

data.Title: Google Search Testing New Features
data.Description: Google Search is testing showing both the "Top-quality store" and "shop rating" labels together  via @gaganghotra_

data.Title: Google My Business (GMB) / Google Business Profile
data.Description: ICYMI: Google Maps adds new "edit" and "post" button for Business Profile listings seroundtable.com/google-maps-ad…

data.Title: Google Search Console Reporting
data.Description: ICYMI: Google says that #s in the Google Search Console reports are unrelated to canonicalization, it is related to Google Sitelinks seroundtable.com/pounds-in-goog…

data.Title: Study: Google Favors Ecommerce Sites & User-Generated Content
data.Description: Study reveals Google search shifts: ecommerce and user-generated content rise, while product review sites lose visibility.

data.Title: Bing Celebrates 15th Birthday
data.Description: Microsoft took a photo of some of the Bing Search team at the Redmond, Seattle office on Bing's 15th birthday last week. The birthday I believe was on June 3rd but the photo was posted by Michael

data.Title: Discord Courts Brands and Marketers
data.Description: The introduction of Discord Quests last month has encouraged publishers to take advantage of the platform’s rise as a marketing channel, whether through officially endorsed Discord Quests or otherwise.

data.Title: Cannes Lions 2024: A Celebration of Creators
data.Description: The power of the creator economy and its hold on the advertising industry is on full display at the Cannes Lions International Festival of Creativity this year.
